mapper.insert: INSERT INTO reservation ( user_id, shop_id, create_time, reserve_time, reservation_people_num, reservation_people_name, reservation_people_phone, reservation_remarks, reservation_status ) VALUES (${reservation.userId}, ${reservation.shopId}, now(), #{reservation.reserveTime, jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, ${reservation.reservationPeopleNum}, #{reservation.reservationPeopleName}, #{reservation.reservationPeoplePhone}, #{reservation.reservationRemarks}, 0)
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation SET reservation_status = 1 WHERE id = ${reservationId}
mapper.select: SELECT id, ( SELECT cover_url FROM shop WHERE id = shop_id ) AS shop_cover_url, ( SELECT shop_name FROM shop WHERE id = shop_id ) AS shop_name, ( SELECT shop_area FROM shop WHERE id = shop_id ) AS shop_area, reserve_time, reservation_people_num FROM reservation WHERE user_id = ${userId} AND reservation_status = ${reservationStatus} ORDER BY reserve_time DESC
